content.stem: (audio) What will happen after the orientation?

choices.A: A factory tour will be held.
choices.C: Supervisors will take them to their departments.

transcript.speaker: N
transcript.text: Welcome to Greenfield Electronics. The orientation for new employees will begin at nine oâ€™clock in Conference Room A. Please bring the documents you received at the reception desk. After the orientation, your supervisors will guide you to your departments. If you have any questions, feel free to ask our staff members.

content.rationale: Supervisors will guide them to their departments.
